category.name: Product Structure.Design Context Filter Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DesignContext_ItemID_Query_lookup_string
preference.preference_description: Determines the I18n key used to retrieve the internationalized name of the saved query used to find work parts. Design Context evaluates this preference when the PortalDesignContextProductItemQuery preference is not set or points to an inaccessible query. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must be a valid user entry name which matches the internationalized name for the ItemID lookup key.
